metadata.title: CVE-2022-0461 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Policy bypass in COOP in Google Chrome prior to 98.0.4758.80 allowed aremote attacker to bypass iframe sandbox via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
